cast.name: 保罗·巴斯克斯 Paul Vasquez
丽莎·简·波斯基 Lisa Jane Persky
杰夫·麦克拉肯 Jeff McCracken
威廉姆·赛德勒 William Sadler
本尼西奥·德尔·托罗 Benicio del Toro
维克·波利佐斯 Vic Polizos

director.name: 亚伦·利普斯塔特 Aaron Lipstadt

introduction: 1. PilotAir date: Sep 13, 1987A Los Angeles policeman (Michael Woods), unfairly terminated, inherits his murdered brother's detective agency and teams with a hustler (Josh Brolin) to probe the death. With Bill Sadler, Lisa Jane Persky.2. Nicky the RoseAir date: Sep 18, 1987A jealous sex symbol (Susan Blakely) hires Jack to look into the extracurricular love life of her mobster beau (Ed Marinaro).3. War BuddyAir date: Sep 25, 1987Helping rescue an old friend from an evil loan shark puts Jack in the middle of gang strife.4. Blue MovieAir date: Oct 2, 1987Jack's investigation of a porn star's murder dredges up memories.5. Blue HotelAir date: Oct 16, 1987A Texas rock star's master tapes are stolen and a record executive is murdered.6. Blue HotelAir date: Oct 23, 1987Johnny's romance with Billy Ray's former girlfriend makes him the prime suspect in the man's murder.7. Barrio NightsAir date: Nov 6, 1987Johnny's car is stolen by heroin smugglers, and his knife turns up in a gang leader's back.8. Nobody Dies in ChinatownAir date: Nov 13, 1987A woman hires Jack to exonerate her brother of a Chinatown shooting, then backs off when he gets close to solving the case.9. Both Sides of the CoinAir date: Nov 20, 1987Cleary joins forces with a former mentor to assist a man being blackmailed in an extortion racket.10. Lights and ShadowsAir date: Dec 4, 1987Cleary and Betts learn about civil rights when one works with a black FBI agent and the other lives with a black family in a white neighborhood.11. High Heels and Silver WingsAir date: Dec 11, 1987An aerospace tycoon hires Jack to gather damaging evidence for a divorce case against his estranged wife.12. Hollywood ConfidentialAir date: Jan 08, 1988A murder takes place after Jack's surveillance photos of an actress and leading man surface in a tabloid.
